com.atakmap.android.imagecapture

Interface Capturable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSheet, AngleOverlayShape, Arrow, Association, AssociationSet, AutoSizeAngleOverlayShape, AxisOfAdvance, Circle, CustomGrid, Doghouse, DrawingCircle, DrawingEllipse, DrawingRectangle, DrawingShape, DynamicRangeAndBearingEndpoint, EditablePolyline, Ellipse, FahArrowWidget.Item, FloatingPointRoute, ImageOverlay, Marker, MetaShape, ModelContentHandler, MsdShape, MultiPolyline, Polyline, RangeAndBearingMapItem, RangeCircle, Rectangle, Route, RouteTrackWrapper, RubberImage, RubberModel, SensorFOV, Shape, SimpleRectangle, TrackPolyline, VehicleModel, VehicleShape, Wedge

    public interface Capturable
    Implement to show up in GRG map capture

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawCanvas(CapturePP capture, android.os.Bundle data)
      Draw the item to the canvas
      android.os.Bundle preDrawCanvas(CapturePP capture)
      Save forwarded points to meta data holder These will be used later in drawCanvas

    • Method Detail

      • preDrawCanvas

        android.os.Bundle preDrawCanvas(CapturePP capture)
        Save forwarded points to meta data holder These will be used later in drawCanvas
        Parameters:
        capture - Capture instance (use forward() to convert)
        Returns:
        Metadata containing point data (or anything else relevant to ortho)

      • drawCanvas

        void drawCanvas(CapturePP capture,
                android.os.Bundle data)
        Draw the item to the canvas
        Parameters:
        capture - Canvas to draw to (use getCanvas())
        data - Point data saved in preDrawCanvas
